Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous hotel & accomodating staff! Would definitely go back.”
Reviews.Author: emamabear
Reviews.Content: girlfriends stayed loft hotel birthday weekend april amazing time door loft stunned gorgeous massive modern ecclectic furnished quality fixtures furniture soon entered immediately started snapping photos send friends home nice despite previous reviews clean issues sounds neighbours bit hot morning remote control adjust temperature settings solved hotel close literally 5 minute drives clubs restaraunts shoppings etc staff amazing spoke english bubbly ensure stay reccommendations continental breakfast replenished 10 am overall loved absolutely 100 stay hope future
